plot: After his most prized possession is stolen, a timid yet eager young man must confront each of his eccentric family members in order to reclaim what belongs to him.
title: Permagrin
plot_es: After his most prized possession is stolen, a timid yet eager young man must confront each of his eccentric family members in order to reclaim what belongs to him.
plot_en: After his most prized possession is stolen, a timid yet eager young man must confront each of his eccentric family members in order to reclaim what belongs to him.
